channel.title: Verizon on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Verizon on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Everything You Want
item.description: [big]On April 3, 2000, one of the most prominent companies of the 21st century was born. That day, the name and logo for Verizon became known to the masses. The company, for better or worse, became a defining middleman, fundamental to the way we use our phones and access our internet.[/big] The next day, a popular rock band released a physical single for what would become their biggest hit. “Everything You Want,” a song from Vertical Horizon’s first major label record, had already been on the radio for a few months by this point.
